Pre-Game Insights: Steven Smith is likely to return after missing the Afghanistan game due to vertigo.
Maxwell faces a fitness test after severely cramping during his herculean innings.
If Smith and Maxwell are available, Australia will have a fully fit squad to choose from for the first time this tournament.
Captain Shakib Al Hasan will miss this game with a fractured left index finger and is likely to be replaced by allrounders Mahedi Hasan or Nasum Ahmed.
Bangladesh are in a fight to be among the top eight teams to qualify for the Champions Trophy and an upset will go a long way towards this.
